page.title: 07Education in rural Devon
page.content: There are no schools or colleges in the area of Ref.02760084.Primary school children are taken by bus to Moretonhampstead and the journey can take as long as an hour and forty_five minutes.This is not because of the dis tance from Moreton but because the bus takes a devious route in order to pick up the children from the isolated farm houses.Secondary school children are also taken by bus to the comprehensive school in Ashburton.Just one child from Doccombe is taken by private hire car to Moreton Primary school.Some of the farmsteads are no longer farm_ houses but the homes of wealthy people who pay for their children to go to private boarding schools. Adults in search of further educat ion must take themselves by car to eve ning classes in a nearby town.
